alert.note: Alert for Chilton; Coosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 1:07AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chilton and west central Coosa Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 106 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gap Of The Mountain, or 7 miles north of Clanton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clanton, Jemison, Thorsby, Lyle, Mitchell Lake, Dollar, Gap Of The Mountain, Lay Lake Dam, Moriah, Higgins Ferry Park, Lay Lake, Lomax, Waxahatchee Creek, Paint Creek, I 65 Rest Area and Cooper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central and east central Alabama.
